summary: A British soldier falls in love with a French woman wanted by the resistance for crimes against her country.
cast: Gabriel Byrne|Marianne Basler|Paul Wyett|Judge Reinhold|Benoît Régent|Maurice Garrel|Jacques Mathou|Bernard Farcy|Roch Leibovici|Claude Mann|Matthew Byam Shaw|David Duffy|Nicolas Tronc|Véronique Müller|Claudine Berg|Philippe Le Mercier|Eric Galliano|Andrew Herman
title: Guerra de pasiones
